author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text: Someday i would love to be a composer to hear the lyrics in your voice~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text: Some nights are meant for Making Love whole night ~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Not just her body
Makeout with her soul 
Few drops she crave for 
Tonight make her overflow 
Orgasm she can't escape 
Force her for lusty waterfall
She thinks herself complete 
Make her believe 
Without you 
She is nothing at all~~

#Desire https://t.co/x75yjNkBQG

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text: Sometimes there is no right until you make the time right~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Balance is the most most important key. 
Everything must have balance or you’ll get stuck somewhere~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
It's always
'Learning'
It's always
'New'

Because, 
It's always
Just
'Random'~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Wind blowed 
Thunderstorm roared 
Lights drizzled 
Loosed whole
Both shivered 
Became one soul
Clouds rained 
Both drenched~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
I do not have a need to be with you 
It's the infinite love I feel for you
That has made all the difference in my life~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Mix some love
Garnish with desires 
Beautiful the 'Life' is~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Love fiercely
Because this all ends
Time is short
Live well
Be kind
Stand tall
Enjoy your life~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text: If you are falling in love with someone, you should love his/her dark side first~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text: I Speak the Language of Fire~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Don't be confident to judge me,
My eyes would love to break your assurance~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
🖤❤

No one can replace you~~ 🌙 https://t.co/Q6vYf9cPtt

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Your love fuels
The night, desirous to be cherished
Your love lights, the night 
To melt as darkness strikes 
Your love fulfill the sights 
Each moment worth expressing 
Your love is what i crave for
Your love is what i aim for~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Flashy the night 
Oozing the tide
High on desire
Time for some love fight~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Leave the riches 
Riches dost make thou sick
Dost good deeds
For deeds thou dost make you mellow~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Thou art no man, 
If thy heart didn't melt
If thou hast not felt
Pain and Bellow

Thou art not guilty
If thou tried 
If thou tried to
Help thy fellow

Thy riches thou hast 
Adds to thy sufferings 
Adds to the suffering of 
Of thy fellow

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
My mind houses a landscape
Bigger than the seen universe.

The weak, broken, depressed, 
Insane. The poor, the oppressed, 
The hopeless walk within it. 

They walk, fueling my passion, 
Pushing me on towards my goal
'A better world for all'~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text: she will realize how much you love her~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
My late night realization is when you love someone, you do crazy things all the time thinking about her,
But in one sided love there is difference, you know that she is not yours but you still love her, you want to complete her all dreams because there is a hope one day.....

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
Let me tast your soul
Through your body's mole~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
His heart was 
Empty and hollow

Hence it found
Space for everyone

But he too craved
For someone to
Fill the void
'Forever'~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
....& I want to paint, 

Paint your soul~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
I wanna hear it when...

Her soul deeply connect and calls my name~~

author: अहम् ब्रह्मास्मि
text:
In sleeves of my heart
There are two hands of thy soul~~

text:

Night shall pass,

Poetry on every 
Curve of your body.

Will bear a beautiful
Story of how we
Unmade ourselves~~

You don't get trigger by others nudity~~

In the whiskey
